Name: Elizabeth
description:
Elizabeth, a smallholder farmer from Kapsabet, is determined to improve her family's livelihood through farming. With a few years of experience in agriculture, she has worked diligently to develop her farming skills. Elizabeth is married and strives to support her household by growing crops that can both sustain her family and provide a source of income.

She faces the challenge of limited resources, particularly modern farm inputs. Elizabeth is seeking a loan to purchase certified seeds and high-nutrient fertilizers, which are crucial to boosting her crop yields. These modern inputs will enable her to grow healthier and more productive crops, leading to increased income and food security for her family. With access to better farming tools, Elizabeth can improve her farm's output and contribute more to the local economy, making her a strong candidate for the loan.
